etfs.name: SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust
etfs.description: Tracks the S&P 500 index of 500 large U.S. companies; one of the most traded ETFs in the world.

etfs.name: Vanguard S&P 500 ETF
etfs.description: Low-cost ETF tracking the S&P 500, offering exposure to leading U.S. large-cap stocks.

etfs.name: iShares Core S&P 500 ETF
etfs.description: iSharesâ€™ version of an S&P 500 tracker; popular for its low expense ratio and liquidity.

etfs.name: Vanguard Total Stock Market ETF
etfs.description: Covers the entire U.S. stock market, including large, mid, small, and micro-cap companies.

etfs.name: Invesco QQQ Trust
etfs.description: Tracks the Nasdaq-100 index, focusing on large non-financial companies with a tech-heavy tilt.

etfs.name: iShares Russell 2000 ETF
etfs.description: Represents the Russell 2000 index of 2,000 small-cap U.S. stocks.

etfs.name: SPDR Dow Jones Industrial Average ETF Trust
etfs.description: Tracks the Dow Jones Industrial Average, a price-weighted index of 30 blue-chip U.S. companies.

etfs.name: Invesco Dow Jones Industrial Average Dividend ETF
etfs.description: Tracks the same 30 Dow stocks but weighted by dividend yield instead of price.

etfs.name: Financial Select Sector SPDR Fund
etfs.description: Tracks S&P 500 financial companies, including banks, insurers, and asset managers.

etfs.name: Industrial Select Sector SPDR Fund
etfs.description: Covers S&P 500 industrial companies such as manufacturers, airlines, and transportation firms.

etfs.name: Consumer Discretionary Select Sector SPDR Fund
etfs.description: Focuses on S&P 500 companies in consumer goods and services that are non-essential purchases.

etfs.name: Consumer Staples Select Sector SPDR Fund
etfs.description: Tracks S&P 500 companies producing essential goods like food, beverages, and household products.

etfs.name: Utilities Select Sector SPDR Fund
etfs.description: Represents S&P 500 utility companies providing electricity, gas, and water services.

etfs.name: Technology Select Sector SPDR Fund
etfs.description: Tracks S&P 500 technology companies, including Apple, Microsoft, and Nvidia.

etfs.name: Health Care Select Sector SPDR Fund
etfs.description: Tracks S&P 500 health care companies such as Johnson & Johnson, UnitedHealth, and Pfizer.

etfs.name: Energy Select Sector SPDR Fund
etfs.description: Tracks S&P 500 energy companies, including oil, gas, and renewable energy producers.

etfs.name: Real Estate Select Sector SPDR Fund
etfs.description: Tracks S&P 500 real estate companies, including REITs and property management firms.
